text: Monty Norman (born Monty Noserovitch; 4 April 1928 â€“ 11 July 2022) was an English movie composer and singer. He was best known for composing the "James Bond Theme". Norman died on 11 July 2022 in Chicago, Illinois at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English composers Category:Musicians from London Category:Singers from London Category:English guitarists Category:Conductors
